Posts.Content: Hi Janie,   I'm knew to this board.  I believe your post was this February, 2007.  I had bilateral tram flap recons. March of 2006.  I never regreted having this method.  If you would like any personal info on it, I would be happy to e-mail you.  Just please put something in the subject line that will catch my attention because I get a lot of bulk mail.   God Bless, Chrissy
Posts.Title: bilateral mastectomy
